'Unanswerable Playoff Questions' pt. 4 w/ @miniminoe & @WillBon13 

Q: Which player has the most to gain towards their legacy in these #NBAPlayoffs ?

Full Pod (from 4/4): https://t.co/POx8wuFYZc https://t.co/pfK8QEI2No

Interesting. Might add a little urgency to the first few games of the series. Still not convinced a guy who hasn't played all season and NEVER with his current team, regardless of talent, will come in and make an immediate meaningful impact though https://t.co/iyJ9sDNj1F
